articles.title: Greetings to President of Montenegro
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Montenegro
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Filip Vujanovic, president of Montenegro, on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the future, too, and wished the president and people of Montenegro success in their efforts for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Japanese Dietmen's Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Japanese Dietmen's Delegation Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese dietmen's delegation led by Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday. 
					 They paid homage to the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who made immortal contribution to the development of friendly relations among countries.
					
					 Then they entered the halls where the Generalissimos lie in state and paid homage to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the Generalissimos received are on display, and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives. 
					
					 They made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Delegation of Japanese Dietmen Enjoys Concert of National Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Delegation of Japanese Dietmen Enjoys Concert of National Symphony Orchestra 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese dietmen's delegation watched a concert given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre on Sunday.
					 The audience also included the working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 The artistes gave the truthful portrayal of the great national pride and revolutionary enthusiasm of the Korean people who are opening up the period of prosperity for Songun Korea, full of conviction in victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They also put on the stage world famous music.
					
					 The concert was highly acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Kaesong Industrial Zone, Panmunjom and Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Opposed to Designation of Minister of Education
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Opposed to Designation of Minister of Education
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- South Korean on-line paper Voice of People carried an editorial laying bare the poor qualifications of a candidate for minister of Education on July 10.
					 The public branded Kim Myong Su as the worst-ever candidate and demanded that he should withdraw the candidacy of his own accord from the very day when he was informally designated as the candidate for minister of Education, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Kim said he would explain all at the confirmation hearing but he failed to give proper explanation at the hearing on July 9.
					
					 Even a lawmaker from the ruling political party was quoted as saying that it seemed that he was watching the integral body of the ruling quarters plagued with all sorts of fraud and corruption.
					
					 The confirmation hearing exposed the scandalous nature of the ruling quarters.

articles.title: Suppression of S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions under Fire
articles.content:
Suppression of S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions made public a statement against the public security authorities' suppression of the confederation, according to the south Korean on-line paper Thongil News on July 9.
					 The police raided the houses of the incumbent director for reunification and the former chairman for reunification of the confederation, the statement noted, branding it as a deliberate suppression to tide over the ruling crisis after the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 At least 10 searchers were involved in the search of just one house, an act pursuant to a plan to find other charges as the suspicions about them were too unreasonable, the statement held, and went on:
					
					 It is impossible to expect anything from the present regime which relies on the outdated suppressive mechanism to get rid of crisis.
					
					 The confederation would strongly react to the suppression.

articles.title: S. Koreans Protest Japan's Plan to Celebrate Anniversary of SDF
articles.content:
S. Koreans Protest Japan's Plan to Celebrate Anniversary of SDF
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean public denounced Japan for planning to celebrate the day of founding the "Self-Defence Forces" in Seoul, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Some time ago the Japanese embassy in Seoul worked out a plan to celebrate in a big scale the 60th anniversary of the SDï¼¦in Seoul.
					
					 This triggered off a strong rebuff of the Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Rejecting and Checking Japan's Exercise of Right to Collective Self-Defence, an alliance of at least 120 south Korean organizations including the Council for the Peaceful Unification of Tangun's Nation, on July 10.
					
					 The organization accused Japan of posing a reckless challenge to legalize the execution of war, contrary to the purport of the Pacifist Constitution.
					
					 Japan has planned to mark the anniversary of SDF in the downtown Seoul while seeking to grab Tok Islets, part of the inviolable territory of Korea, far from making heartfelt repentance and apology for the past crimes. The organization termed this a revelation of the intention of reinvasion of Korea.
					
					 The organization clarified the will to take actions to check the ceremony.
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification also charged that to celebrate the anniversary of SDF is little short of negating the past crimes and adding insult and injury to the Korean nation.

articles.title: Korean in China Supports Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Korean in China Supports Statement of DPRK Government
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China Ri Sun Nam made public a statement on July 8 in support of the statement of the DPRK government.
					 Saying that President Kim Il Sung devoted his all to handing over a reunified homeland to the future generations, the chairman noted that thanks to his tireless efforts the immortal great programmes for Korea's reunification including the three principles of national reunification, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation were provided.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set it as his lifetime mission to carry out the President's last instructions for national reunification and made sure that the historic June 15 joint declaration was adopted, thereby opening up a new era of By Our Nation Itself, the chairman said, adding:
					
					 But obstacles and difficulties still lie in the way of carrying out the cause of Korea's reunification due to the south Korean authorities who are pushing the north-south relations to a catastrophe while pursuing confrontation with fellow countrymen with the backing of outsiders.
					
					 They are greatly mistaken if they think they can settle the internal issue of the nation in reliance on the U.S. imperialists who are chiefly to blame for Korea's division and for turning the Korean peninsula into the world's biggest hotspot.
					
					 The statement of the DPRK government reflects the desire and wish of all the Koreans as well as the principled patriotic stand to create an atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations and greet the new morning of Korea's reunification By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The chairman expressed his full support for the DPRK government statement.
					
					 He vowed to devote himself to the sacred cause of national reunification which will surely triumph as there is Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Young Koreans in China Support Statement of DPRK Government
articles.content:
Young Koreans in China Support Statement of DPRK Government
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China on July 8 issued a statement in support of the statement issued by the DPRK government.
					 The statement said that President Kim Il Sung devoted his efforts to providing the Koreans with a reunified country and laid a firm foundation for independent reunification.
					
					 It is the firm will of the DPRK government and the steadfast faith of the Koreans in China to improve the inter-Korean relations and open up the era of a new turning phase for the country's reunification under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who put forward it as his greatest noble mission to implement the last instructions of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for national reunification, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 Now is the time for young people to advance in the van of the struggle for the country's reunification true to the call of the homeland.
					
					 All young people of the Federation will positively support and uphold the principled stand of the DPRK government.

articles.title: Struggle Waged in Japan for Settlement of Issue of Aiding Korean Schools
articles.content:
Struggle Waged in Japan for Settlement of Issue of Aiding Korean Schools
						
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-Japan Students Friendship Network and the Association of Graduates of Korean High Schools launched a Friday action calling for the application of the tuition-free program for senior high schools outside the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on July 4.
					 Present there were students of the Korean University, Korean high schools, Korean compatriots, Japanese students and citizens, more than 1 000 in all.
					
					 The representatives of the DPRK-Japan Students Friendship Network, the Association of Graduates of Korean High Schools, the Society of Principals of Korean High Schools and the Association of Societies of Mothers of Korean Schools across Japan thrust a letter of request demanding the immediate application of the tuition-free program to the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology.
					
					 It was followed by a meeting for reviewing the struggle for the settlement of the aid for Korean schools.
					
					 Students of Kyushu senior high school staged a signature campaign at railway stations demanding the immediate application of the tuition-free program for Korean schools on June 28.
					
					 They vowed to wage more active struggle for the settlement of the issue of aiding Korean schools and for filing a complaint against the government over the claim for damages.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Presented with Certificate on Exploit by Ecuadorian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Presented with Certificate on Exploit by Ecuadorian Organization
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was presented with a certificate on exploit by the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					 A ceremony of conveying the certificate took place in Guaranda City on June 29.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Daniel Alvarez Celi, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification who doubles as secretary general of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung, Julio Ballesteros Espin, chairman of the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People who doubles as secretary of Guaranda regional committee of the same committee, members of the Bolivar State branch of the Communist Party of Ecuador, governors of Guaranda City, Bolivar State and 19 counties, other officials concerned and citizens.
					
					 Present there on invitation were members of the cooperative group of Korean Koryo Medicine working in Ecuador.
					
					 The certificate was conveyed to the head of the cooperative group.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Cuba, Poland and Finland on July 6 and 7 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the meetings were photos documenting the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification lauded the President as the greatest man, saying that he had the honor of being received by the President.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association said:
					
					 The President bequeathed the socialist power of independence, self-sustenance and self-defence in which the immortal Juche idea is embodied to the Korean people as his legacy.
					
					 The world knows no such a great revolutionary and outstanding leader like the President who made great contributions to the cause of human emancipation holding aloft the banner of independence against imperialism his all life.
					
					 The great exploits of the President will be everlasting along with the century.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish Communists' League and the chairman of the Finland-Korea Society praised the whole life of the President as the one for the people, adding he is the eternal leader of not only the Korean people but the world progressive humankind.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Finland.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries on July 4 and 5 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included remembrance meetings, film shows and photo and book exhibitions in Britain, Bangladesh, Thailand and Spain.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of the President.
					
					 Also on display there were photos and books introducing the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Fireworks of a thriving nation".
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said that it is the greatest exploit achieved by the President that he perfectly settled the issue of giving continuity to the revolution.
					
					 The representative of Britain-DPRK Friendship Association praised Kim Il Sung as the people's leader who devoted his all to the country and its people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 Speakers at the remembrance meeting held in Bangladesh praised the exploits the President performed on behalf of the times and revolution.
					
					 The chairman of the Thai committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung stressed that the exploits performed by the President on behalf of the Korean revolution and world revolution would be everlasting.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the remembrance meeting held in Britain.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Hungarian and Thai Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Hungarian and Thai Personages
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Hungarian and Thai figures issued statements on July 4 and 6 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung, said the Hungarian revolutionaries are highly lauding the President who is the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK and the Korean People's Army as the sun of Juche. He went on:
					
					 The President founded the guiding idea of revolution, enabling the popular masses to independently and creatively carve out their destiny as the master of the world and their destinies.
					
					 He was the great leader who led the anti-Japanese and anti-U.S. confrontation to victory.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a socialist power by wisely leading the Korean people in their struggle for the post-war reconstruction, socialist revolution and socialist construction.
					
					 Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, said:
					
					 History records a lot of leaders who claimed to work for the people but the world knows no such a great man as the President who devoted his all to the country and its people.
					
					 The President was, indeed, the leader of the country and the great father who looked after the people's living and destiny with responsibility.
					
					 He defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, achieved Korea's freedom and independence, led the revolutionary cause of Juche only to the road of glory and firmly defended the world peace, stability and prosperity by dint of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by British Organization
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on July 3 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We, friends of the DPRK, sincerely revere the President.
					
					 The President founded the immortal Juche idea, great torch of human emancipation, and successfully applied it to the revolution and construction.
					
					 He led the two arduous revolutionary wars to victory and built the socialist system centered on the popular masses on the land of Korea.
					
					 He regarded it as his motto to believe in the people as in Heaven and made sure that all policies and lines served the people.
					
					 He abolished the tax system in the DPRK and enforced the socialist policies including the system of the free education and free medical treatment. These are miracles in modern history.
					
					 The President always gave field guidance and found himself among the people and led the same ordinary life as them.
					
					 He encouraged the struggle for cause of global independence against the U.S.-led imperialists and thus made great contributions to peace in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 He set forth the three principles of national reunification which are the most fair and just and devoted his tireless efforts to Korea's reunification till the last moments of his life.
					
					 He will always be alive in the hearts of the world people.

articles.title: Russian Papers Praise Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Russian Papers Praise Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos documenting his exploits on June 28 and July 2 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of his demise. 
					 The newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda in an article "July 8 Remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung" said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of the revolution in his teens and created the Juche idea, Songun idea to indicate the roads for not only the Korean people but also mankind. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle to bring the liberation of Korea, built the people's country and defeated for first time in history the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and firmly defended sovereignty and independence of the country. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung fully supported the struggle for national liberation and construction of new society of the peoples of different countries. 
					
					 The paper Pri Amurskiye Wedomostsi in an article "Kim Il Sung, benevolent image" said:
					
					 The sunny smile of President Kim Il Sung reflects the noble humanity and warm tenderness. 
					
					 The President always treated people kindly and took warm care of them with paternal love with a broad smile on his face. This was peculiar to the President as a great man. 
					
					 The benevolent image of the President will be kept in the hearts of all people for all ages. 
					
					 The newspaper Zavtra in an article "Eternal leader of the Korean people" praised the noble revolutionary career of the peerless great man who performed immortal exploits for the era and history through outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and noble revolutionary practices.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Foreign Countries 
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Angola, Nigeria and Thailand on July 7 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Shown there were Korean films including "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "The Arch of Triumph". 
					
					 The chairman of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was the father of the Korean nation who devoted his whole life to the country and its people. 
					
					 He victoriously led the Fatherland Liberation War, always sharing joy and sorrow with the people during the hard-fought war days. 
					
					 There was no such a great leader of the people as the President. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the talented strategist and great leader who was possessed of distinguished leadership ability recognized by the world. 
					
					 His exploits for the era and humankind will be immortal. 
					
					 The vice director of the general hospital in Zamfara State of Nigeria and other personages highly praised the undying exploits of the President who turned the DPRK into a country centered on the popular masses and a powerful socialist country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, paying the profound tribute to him. 
					
					 The director of the Civilize Import-Export Company of Thailand said that Kim Il Sung always found himself among the people in his life.
